thought: I should check for low prices and free gifts
observation: Home - Keppler  English Deutsch About us press Research An Unwavering For over 30 years, Keppler Asset Management stood for value-based equity portfolio strategies driven by in-depth fundamental research Until its conversion to a family office at the beginning of 2024, Keppler Asset Management was a boutique investment advisory firm based in New York specializing in translating classic value concepts into global equity strategies with a focus on conservative, long-term growth across a range of investment universes, including sector- and region-specific equities. Read More Our Approach The active equity strategies we offered until the end of 2023 aimed to deliver superior long-term performance and control the risk of loss through a strong commitment to value. To do so, we employed extensive quantitative-fundamental research and our own innovative multi-factor models. Principles Prudence – Discipline – Patience Investing for the long term Strategies •	Active market selection Risk Management •	Margin of safety Latest Press Keppler Asset Management was frequently mentioned as a well-respected value investment manager. This is a selection of articles and interviews with Michael Keppler featuring the firm and its activities. View More Smart Investor | February 2021 Interview: "Say hello to the emperor's new clothes!” by Ralf Flierl Fonds Professionell Online December 2020 Fund manager cross-examined: "The technology sector is extremely overvalued" by Hans Heuser Focus-Money Interview: "German stocks are cheap" by Heike Bangert THIS WAS OUR TEAM … dedicated to delivering superior performance View Full Team If you access and use this website, you accept and agree to be bound by and comply with these terms. You agree to review the terms regularly and your continued access or use of the site will mean that you agree to any changes. If you do not accept the terms, you must not use the site. The information published and opinions expressed are provided by Keppler Asset Management Inc. for informational purposes only. The information, material, terms and content provided in the pages of the site may be changed at any time without notice. The information is not intended to provide specific financial, investment, tax, legal or accounting advice for you, and is not intended to be relied upon in that regard. You should not act or rely on the information without professional assistance. All investing is subject to risk, including the possible loss of the money you invest. Investment objectives, risks, charges, expenses, and other important information about the public funds that invest according to our strategies are described in the relevant prospectuses. No information published on the website of Keppler Asset Management Inc. constitutes an offer or recommendation to buy or sell any investment instruments, to effect any transactions, or to conclude any legal act of any kind whatsoever. © Copyright 2024 Keppler Asset Management Inc.
